modName: Repede Wolf Follower - Tales of Vesperia
summary: Adds Repede from the Tales of Vesperia as a wolf follower.
descriptionHtml:
--Mod info--
You can find Repede hanging out with the Companions behind Jorrvaskr.

Currently this mod only has the basic follow, wait, dismiss commands. Repede is essential and unique. 

Our current plans for future updates include a having Repede carry items, improved model and texture to include weapons and accessories that he wears in ToV, and a puppy version of Repede.

--Updates--
v0.75 - Fix the problem that some people were having when talking to Repede. Let me know if any other problems occur.

--Conflicts--
U.F.O mod will cause conflicts. Its possible other mods that modify followers will break this mod. If you find any let me know

--Troubleshooting-- 
Cant talk to Repede
-Try entering \"Set PlayerAnimalCount to 0\" into the console
-Mash \'E\' a couple times

If you find other problems or the above doesn\'t help you then please let me know and I\'ll try my best to fix it.

--Neuroshock modders--
RoboticNixon - Makes pretty pictures
Reptile7383 - Does everything but make pretty pictures

Don\'t forget to rate and endorse if you like the file!
author: reptile7383
